src:
Melengking Tajam! Penjual Sarapan Ini Punya Suara Mirip Sirine
07 Nov 2019, 23:30 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Foto: istimewa

Jakarta - Banyak cara unik yang dilakukan pedagang makanan demi menarik perhatian. Seperti ibu penjual sarapan ini yang selalu berteriak dengan suara melengking mirip sirine.Pemilik nama Sumartini ini punya cara unik saat menjajakan dagangannya. Wanita berhijab ini setiap paginya berkeliling dengan gerobak, menjajakan aneka kue dan menu sarapan lainnya.Sumartini berjualan di daerah Sukodono, Lumajang, Jawa Timur. Yang membuatnya menjadi dikenal luas bukanlah menu makanannyya melainkan aksinya menjajakan makanan dengan cara berteriak lantang dan melengking tajam."Seeeeeeeeeeeeee, sego jagung, ketan, klepon, bubur, lapis, onde-onde, buuuuuuuuuuuu," ujar Sumartini dalam video yang diunggah netizen.


Foto: istimewa

Baca juga : Jualan di Tempat Nyleneh, Para Penjual Makanan Ini Sukses Bikin Ngakak Teriakan Sumartini ini memang unik tapi kadang juga memekakan telinga. Jika didengarkan teliti, suara teriakan Sumartini mirip sirine mobil polisi maupun pemadam kebakaran.Video cara Sumartini berjualan ini viral pada pertengahan Oktober 2019. Caranya berjualan ini dianggap unik dan menarik.Sumartini sudah hampir lima tahun berjualan dengan gayanya yang nyentrik. Ia juga selalu menyebutkan dagangannya dengan istilah 'sarapan wong urip'.Setiap pagi Sumartini berkeliling lepas Subuh. Ia mengaku bangga karena cara berjualannya ini juga sekaligus bisa menjadi alarm yang membangunkan orang untuk sholat subuh dan mencari sarapan.


Foto: istimewa

Baca juga : Aksi Nyeleneh Tukang Gorengan Jualan di Atas Pohon Curi Perhatian NetizenMeski pernah dikomplain perihal teriakannya, tapi Sumartini mengaku sekarang orang banyak yang paham dan memakluminya. Setelah videonya viral, Sumartini pun mendapat banyak perhatian.Dagangannya semakin laris manis, ia pun kini kerap diundang media karena banyak yang ingin mendengar langsung suara melengking ala Sumartini. Setelah mendengar suara Sumartini, apakah Anda tertarik membelinya?




Simak Video "Food Blogger Tirta Lie Berbagi Cara Temukan Rasa Autentik Bakmi"

text:
Sharp Squeaky! This Breakfast Seller Has A Sound Like Sirens
Nov 7 2019, 23:30 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Photo: special

Jakarta - Many unique ways to be done by food vendors to attract attention. Like this breakfast seller's mother who always screams with a high-pitched voice similar to a siren. The owner of the name Sumartini has a unique way to peddle his wares. This woman who wears hijab every morning goes around in a cart, peddling various cakes and other breakfast menus. Sumartini sells in Sukodono, Lumajang, East Java. What made it widely known was not the food but the action of peddling food by shouting loudly and shrill, "Seeeeeeeeeeeeee, sego of corn, sticky rice, klepon, porridge, layers, onde-onde, buuuuuuuuuuu," Sumartini said in the video uploaded by netizens.


Photo: special

Also read: Selling at Nyleneh, These Food Sellers Succeed at Making Sumartini's Shouts Really unique but sometimes also deafening. If you listen carefully, the sound of Sumartini's screams resembles the sirens of police and fire engines. This video method of selling Sumartini was viral in mid-October 2019. The method of selling is considered unique and interesting. Sumartini has been selling for almost five years with its eccentric style. He also always mentions his wares with the term 'breakfast wong urip'. Every morning Sumartini goes around just before dawn. He claimed to be proud because this way of selling could also be an alarm that wakes people up for morning prayers and looking for breakfast.


Photo: special

Also read: The action of selling fried foods on stolen trees The attention of Netizenski was once complained about his screams, but Sumartini admitted that now many people understood and understood them. After the video was viral, Sumartini also received a lot of attention. His trading was selling well, he is now often invited by the media because many want to hear Sumartini's high-pitched voice. After hearing Sumartini's voice, are you interested in buying it?




Check out the video "Food Blogger Tirta Lie Shares How to Discover Authentic Noodles"
